Submitting Expense Reports: To submit an expense report in Concur, log in, go to 'Expense', create a new report, add expenses, attach receipts, and submit.
Attaching Receipts: To attach receipts in Concur, open the expense report, click 'Manage Receipts', and upload the required documents.
Adding Expenses: To add expenses to a travel request, click 'Add', select the expense type, enter details, and save.
Linking Travel Requests to Expense Repor: To link a travel request to an expense report, open the report, click 'Report Details' > 'Manage Requests', and add the relevant request.
